title: C.I.A. Intelligence Helped Lead Mexican Authorities to ‘El Mencho’
summary_full: Mexican officials said they had found the elusive cartel kingpin by tracking a romantic partner. The C.I.A. provided some intelligence critical to the operation.
summary_public: Mexican officials said they had found the elusive cartel kingpin by tracking a romantic partner. The C.I.A. provided some intelligence critical to the operation.
